title: Holidays in Greece TV
text: Holidays in Greece TV is the satellite only <a href="Television%20network">network</a> in <a href="Greece">Greece</a> devoted exclusively to <a href="travel">travel</a> and <a href="tourism">tourism</a>. Its aim is to promote the Greek <a href="tourism">tourism</a> industry, which is one of the main industries in Greece along with <a href="Freight%20transport">shipping</a>. <a href="Holiday">Holiday</a>s in Greece TV launched in the <a href="Autumn">fall</a> of 2004. All areas of Greece are covered, as well as a look at various companies involved in the tourism industry. Programming includes <a href="Documentary%20film">documentaries</a>, <a href="presentation">presentation</a>s, programmes covering specific topics such as <a href="nightlife">nightlife</a>, <a href="Restaurant">dining</a>, SPA, <a href="Recreation">recreational activities</a> and more. The show provides information about cultural hotspots such as <a href="cave">cave</a>s, <a href="Monastery">monasteries</a>, <a href="museum">museum</a>s, traditional <a href="Villages%20in%20Bandra%2C%20Mumbai">villages</a> and ancient sites. Holidays in Greece also delivers a daily tourist news program providing up to date information from all around the country. Holidays in Greece TV is the first FTA satellite channel launched in Greece, it is available on Hotbird 6 and Hellas Sat 2 which cover all of <a href="Europe">Europe</a> and parts of <a href="Africa">Africa</a> and <a href="Asia">Asia</a>. It is also available online through jumptv.com, a subscription-based service. Various local TV channels all around Greece broadcast parts of the programming from Holidays in Greece TV, including Crete, Messinia, Korinthos, Rhodes, Kefalonia, Serres & Drama. In addition, the channel is available on local cable in <a href="Skiathos">Skiathos</a>, <a href="Skopelos">Skopelos</a>, <a href="Ios">Ios</a>, <a href="Phthiotis">Fthiotida</a> and <a href="Arachova">Arahova</a>.
